data.text:
Stocks makes it easy to follow the daily performance of your stocks and the market. Track groups of stocks, indexes, mutual funds, ETFs, and currencies through watchlists. Dive into tickers to get the latest quotes and track movements through interactive charts. Stay on top of the latest business news from top publications around the world. With iCloud you can track your Stocks whether youâre on your Mac, your iPad, your Apple Watch, or on your iPhone.

Features

Watchlists

â¢Â Group stocks, indexes, mutual funds, ETFs, currencies into one or more watchlists.

â¢Â Track performance of tickers in each watchlist at a glance through color-coded spark-lines, price quotes, as well as price change, percentage change, and market capitalization.

â¢Â Organize tickers within watchlists manually, by name, by price change, by percentage change, or by market capitalization.

Ticker Details

â¢Â Explore specific tickers in your watchlist through interactive price charts for day, week, month, and multi-month periods. Compare prices at different times.

â¢Â For any ticker view key details including after-hours price, trading volume, EPS, and more.

â¢Â Add the date for a companyâs upcoming earnings report to your calendar.

Business News

â¢Â Read and watch stories specific to the companies you follow from top-rated business publications powered by Apple News*.

â¢Â Apple News+ subscribers can see Apple News+ stories right in Stocks.

More ways to view Stocks

â¢Â Use the Stocks app on your iPhone, your iPad, your Apple Watch, and your Mac.

â¢Â Add Stocks widgets to your Home Screen or Lock Screen to see price quotes at a glance.

â¢Â Ask Siri questions such as âHow is the Nikkei doing?â or âWhat is Appleâs P/E ratio?â

*Top Stories and Apple News stories are available in the US, UK, Canada, and Australia; news stories in other countries are provided by Yahoo.
